order by REGDATE desc ) as list where list.rn between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT UB_SEQ , UB_LEADERID , CASE UB_LEADERGUBN WHEN '0' THEN '학원' WHEN '1' THEN '교습소' WHEN '2' THEN '공부방' WHEN '3' THEN '교육단체' WHEN '4' THEN '일반리더' END AS UB_LEADERGUBN , UB_NAME , UB_TELNO1 , UB_SCHOOLINFO , UB_DESC , LD_ID , LD_GROUPNM , DATE_FORMAT( REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS REGDATE FROM ( SELECT UB_SEQ , UB_LEADERID , UB_LEADERGUBN , UB_NAME , UB_TELNO1 , UB_SCHOOLINFO , UB_DESC , U.REGDATE , L.LD_ID , L.LD_GROUPNM , @rnum := @rnum + 1 AS rn FROM (SELECT @rnum := 0) r, CG_USER_BUYINFO U LEFT JOIN CG_LEADER L ON U.UB_LEADERID = L.LD_SEQ WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC ) AS LIST where list.rn between #{start} and #{end}
